page.title: 19The Manifold Show, Hulme End
page.content: The Manifold Show is an annual agricultural show and is held at Archford Moor Farm, Hulme End on the first Saturday in August. There are competitions for farm animals and pets for which rosettes are awarded. There is large exhibition ring for farm animals and a smaller one for pets. Sometimes there is a demonstration of work with a sheep dog. Shops in the area have exhibitions of their farm machinery for people to look at and buy. There are also displays of old tractors, vintage engines and other old machines. There are side-shows, all sorts of stalls, take-away food and drink outlets and other small attractions.
